displayName: Poor Man's Battle Armor (Poomba) - YAML - 3014 Gameplay
description:
Available from 3014 (gameplay version).

Uses a scaled down vindicator and a whole lot of duct-tape to simulate the elemental experience. Be prepared to lose limbs and die repeatedly!

I rate this mod a 2/5 and that is being generous. It is kind of fun though!

Required Mods:

Yet Another Mech Lab
author: Snafulator
